entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except mainly cloudy along the coast with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
